mapper.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN EA.RESULT_CODE = 00 THEN '성공' ELSE '실패' END RESULT_GUBN , DATE_FORMAT(EA.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT , EA.ENTER_API_CODE, EA.SERVICE_KEY, EA.RESULT_CODE , EA.PARKING_AREA_CODE, EA.CAR_NUMBER_RECV , DATE_FORMAT(EA.ENTER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ENTER_DT, EA.ERR_MSG, EA.RESULT_MSG, EA.WALLET_FREE_YN , DATE_FORMAT(EA.MDFCN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MDFCN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(EA.RECEIVE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') RECEIVE_DT FROM T_ENTER_AUTOPAY_API_HISTORY EA WHERE 1=1 AND EA.RESULT_CODE != '00'
AND EA.CAR_NUMBER_RECV LIKE '%${carNumber}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(EA.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(EA.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} ORDER BY EA.REG_DT DESC
